meanings.definition: Added to something else, especially when unnecessary or excessive.
meanings.sent1: The superadded decorations on the cake made it look too busy.
meanings.sent2: The superadded features on the phone made it more expensive.
meanings.sent3: The superadded toppings on the pizza were so many that it toppled over!
meanings.sent4: Her superadded enthusiasm for the project was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The superadded details in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: To add something extra to something else.
meanings.sent1: She superadded extra sugar to her coffee.
meanings.sent2: The chef superadded a secret ingredient to the recipe.
meanings.sent3: He superadded more jokes to his speech, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist superadded layers of paint to create depth in the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The teacher superadded examples to help the students understand better.
